title: Topic 008 Question 066
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains two resource groups named ContosoRG and ContosoDev, an Azure data factory named Contoso Data Factory, and a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines named Pipeline1.
You plan to deploy Contoso Data Factory to ContosoRG by using Pipeline1.
You add the Azure Resource Manager (ARM) template deployment task shown in the following exhibit.
Use the drop-down menus to select the answer choice that completes each statement based on the information presented in the graphic
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
